existing_features.title: Make the site-wide background image render darker so foreground content and the bubble overlay decorations stand out more, by adding a dark overlay/gradient on top of the existing background images for both desktop and mobile/portrait breakpoints (without changing the image filenames or removing the fixed/cover/no-repeat behavior).

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the website background image darker (increase darkness/contrast so bubbles stand out more)
